title: 47.3 (LOA)
content:
“Come on!” You’ve only stopped for a few minutes, and already Hy is pacing around restlessly. “We’ve still got plenty of mushrooms to find for my stew! If you’re too tired to help, I’ll head off on my own!”

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue gathering mushrooms. Discard all   from Hy. Make a stew using only cards with the Mycelial keyword to achieve Hy’s goal.

B) Some other time. Discard Hy Pimpot. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
